mapper.select: SELECT e.id, e.promotionId, e.storeId, i.NAME AS storeName, mg.name AS storeGradeName, p.applyStartTime AS applyStartTime, p.applyEndTime AS applyEndTime, e.state FROM t_pro_promotion_entry e LEFT JOIN t_pro_promotion p ON e.promotionId = p.id LEFT JOIN t_mer_store_info i ON e.storeId = i.id LEFT JOIN t_mer_merchant_grade mg ON i.merchantGradeId = mg.id WHERE e.deletedFlag = 0 AND p.deletedFlag = 0 AND i.deletedFlag = 0 AND e.id = #{id}
SELECT id, promotionId, storeId, state, memo FROM t_pro_promotion_entry WHERE deletedFlag = 0 AND promotionId = #{promotionId} AND storeId = #{storeId}
